attributes.title: LIES
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! Friends told me that this was secretly the original flappy bird and they put it back in the App Store like this so now one could find it. NOT TRUE!!!! THIS IS NOT FLAPPY BIRD!!!!! While the orange character IS funny, he’s honestly not believable as the president of a country. The game is boring, unrealistic and NOT FLAPPY BIRD!! If I could give it negative stars I would. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: No.
attributes.review: Honestly genuinely downloaded the app and it was horrible never had a worst experience. Lagged and crashed my home, oh and no to mention it’s an app that helps support and child Predator, racist, sexist man. Who only cares about him self! Thanks for you time but no thank you to this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever developed.
attributes.review: What a waste of a download. My whole phone literally crashed after I downloaded the app. I lost all of my stuff and I’m pretty sure that this app is stealing your info and your identity. Beware!!! Don’t download this awful awful app, it’s literally trash.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with what’s going on and my phone got so glitchy and slow!! My phone kept freezing until I had to delete the app. I think the Russians had something to do with this it was like my phone got hacked!!! This app is the REAL virus!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: I CANT HAVE KIDS ANYMORE
attributes.review: this app is dangerous, i saw traumatizing things so i sent a photo of tony lopez’s nudes to trump and a swat team came over and attacked my family!! They started putting vicious rats in my pants!! they ruined my reproductive system and now i can’t have children!! don’t download this app!! 😭😭

attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is THE WORST. I opened it and it immediately crashed and then tried again and it crashed again, I guess quality of presidency and app quality are tied together because this app is one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.title: Horrible, just horrible
attributes.review:
I thought it would be the best. The best ever. The very best. The best in the world. The whole world.

But it turns out it’s just trash filling up space on my phone and isn’t accurate at all. Disappointed. Would give 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: HELPPPP
attributes.review: i opened the app and i saw something, idk what it was but it was scary. BE WARNED I JUST DIED! you might die to, but i resurrcted but it took a lot of eventful and ice cream. but i don’t recommend because it will spam you with notifications and more. ok enough of that i’m going to mcdonald’s anyone want something?

attributes.title: HORID
attributes.review: okay so i downloaded this app expecting to tier, bc of how high trump presents himself. it was TRASH😳. it glitches every time u click on something😡. this next part is ABSURD🙈 RIGHT when i open the app a nud3 shows up! its a very orange man with a 🤏🏼🍤‼️‼️‼️‼️ it was mortifying!  i do not recommend. 0stars if i could. 🍤😼🙈🤏🏼😎🕴👻🌚😌

attributes.title: Cheeto with toupee
attributes.review: This app is clearly broken all it shows is a Cheeto with a toupee and not a good one no it’s like a dead corn husk toupee and it also shows really weird stuff like the Cheeto is naked and the toupee is lopsided like I did not sign up for a Cheeto and not even a good one a soggy corn husk wearing Cheeto like I want a spicy Cheeto this one look old as hell
